name: Flash

values.name: getMessage
values.comment: Getting the flash message out of the state container

values.name: none
values.comment: An empty State, no flash message

values.name: setFlash
values.comment:
Initializing the timer with a flash message

  Example:

    Flash.setFlash RemoveFlash 2000 "My flash message for 2 seconds"
values.type: msg -> Time.Time -> String -> ( Flash.State, Platform.Cmd.Cmd msg )
